creator: cowwoc@bbs.darktech.org
text:
Please add the following (optional) functionality: the shutdown script should
block until Tomcat has shutdown. Otherwise executing:

shutdown.bat
startup.bat

   does not guarantee startup will work as port 80 or 8080 might still be in use.

creator: alex@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11754 ***
